titles.title: There is glory in my soul

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
There is glory, glory,
there is glory in my soul!
Everyday brighter grows,
and I conquer all my foes;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
There is glory, glory,
there is glory in my soul!
There is glory in my soul.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Since I lost my sins
and I found my Savior,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Since by faith I sought
and obtained God’s favor,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Since He cleansed my heart,
gave me sight for blindness,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Since He touched and
healed me in loving kindness,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Since with God I’ve walked,
having sweet communion,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Brighter grows each day
in this heav’nly union,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Since I entered Canaan
on my way to heaven,
There is glory in my soul!

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Since the day my life
to the Lord was given,
There is glory in my soul!
